inclusion.criterion: Aged 9 months (249 to 291 days) for Groups 1, 2, and 3 or aged 12 months (365 to 386 days) for Group 4 at the time of enrollment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The parent or legal guardian has signed and dated the Institutional Review Board (IRB)-approved informed consent form.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of documented invasive meningococcal disease or previous meningococcal vaccination
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), hepatitis B, or hepatitis C seropositivity as reported by the parent or legal guardian
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine. The genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%. He was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids.
